title: (x) Art Deco sans - Bernard Gothic {Andrew J Sipe}
content:
I thought initially it was Kabel, but I was wrong. Does anyone recognize it?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090814172447im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SanFran_5359.gif)
author: rickruss

comments.content: Mix of Serif Gothic and Neutraface.

I think it’s Bernhard Gothic (SG) by Spiece Graphics : [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/bernhard-gothic-sg/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090814172447/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/bernhard-gothic-sg/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/bernhard-gothic-sg/")
Jan’s usually right though, and Neutraface is a close approximation (a nice font to boot.)
That wasn’t an ID but rather a description.
